Cyclist Track Days 2025 info and how to get tickets

Cyclist Track Days are back for 2025 and is your chance to spend a day trialling, testing and thrashing the top road bikes from some of the biggest brands in the world – all on purpose-built tracks.

Each day gave riders the chance to spend hours blasting round the track on top road bikes from brands and we will even throw in lunch and coffee.

With three fantastic tracks to choose from, don’t miss out on your chance to take part:

26th April 2025, Odd Down Cycle Track Bath,
17th May 2025, Lee Valley VeloPark London,
7th June 2025, The Brownlee Centre, Leeds

BOOK YOUR TICKET HERE

The Bikes

Whether you are in the market for a new bike or just want to try out some of the best bikes in the world, Cyclist Track Days offer a unique experience to test the latest top-end bikes from the leading brands on the market. All brands will also have ambassadors onsite who can advise you on the models and discuss all things cycling.

What Your Ticket Includes

Track tickets for each day cost just £35 (online only), or from £30 for Cyclist magazine subscribers.
(Tickets on the day will cost £40)

BOOK YOUR TICKET HERE

For this amazing price you will get:

  • Unlimited cycling for your chosen day from a selection of top brand road bikes
  • A free coffee, lunch and dessert courtesy of Cyclist 
  • The chance to meet like-minded cycling enthusiasts and the Cyclist editorial team

This year we are offering Spectator tickets free of charge and they will allow entry to the track side during your chosen event plus the chance to meet the team behind the magazine. (NB – this is entry only and does not include lunch).

A 15% group discount will automatically be applied to any purchase of 4 or more track tickets.

PLEASE NOTE: ALL RIDERS MUST BE OVER 16 AND OWN BIKES CANNOT BE TAKEN ONTO THE TRACK.

Each track day will run from 10am – 4pm. (Odd Down will run from 11am – 4pm)

To obtain your subscriber price, use the code that has recently been sent to you. If you have not received your subscriber code please contact the Cyclist events team.
